General.Name: Toplus Global Co Ltd
General.Description: Toplus Global Co., Ltd. engages in the food and beverage business in Taiwan. It operates 3 seafood restaurants under the DingXian brand; and 8 wedding halls and 1 marine manor under the AmazingHall brand. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 351, Zhongshan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
